for_sales.sales_text: One off topsail Schooner. Full camping inventory including 2 part camping cover. GRP hull. Galvanised centreplate. Yanmar YSE8 inboard diesel. 2.5hp Suzuki outboard. Bowsprit and boom douglas fir, other spars aluminium. Fitted out in teak, iroko, mahogany e.t.c. All foresails on Wykham-Martin furling gear. 2 topsails. Reefing squaresail on foremast. Optional roller reefing on main. Garmin Oregon GPS chart plotter. Bespoke braked road trailer (all up weight 1,400kg) and 6’ Barrowboat tender included.

OGA1895 (sail number NOT age!) 20’ topsail schooner, 26’ with bowsprit. Old Gaffers Dayboat eligible for The Dinghy Cruising Association, full camping inventory including camping cover. Complete refurb. 1996-1999. GRP hull, nearly everything else spruce, teak, iroko, mahogany, bronze, aluminium and a bit of galvanised iron, mainly the lifting centreplate. Yanmar YSE8 7hp inboard diesel. Seven sails including reefing squaresail on foremast. Road trailer to keep after free delivery UK mainland. Lying undercover SW Scotland. FY3 is a one-off, difficult to value. Seller is now a genuine old gaffer.
for_sales.summary: Lying undercover SW Scotland. FY3 is a one-off, SSR No 93916. She"s am Old Gaffers Dayboat eligible for The Dinghy Cruising Association, full camping inventory including camping cover and road trailer.

boat.full_description:
Ferryman III is a 20’ topsail schooner, 26' with bowsprit, built as a 'one off' in 1950. She is an Old Gaffers Dayboat eligible for The Dinghy Cruising Association and had a complete refurbishment between 1996 and 1999. Based in Scotland, she has a GRP hull, with nearly everything else spruce, teak, iroko, mahogany, bronze, aluminium and a bit of galvanised iron, mainly the lifting centreplate.

She won the OGA Pitchfork for the longest voyage to Solent Gaffers Race: Blackchub to Bursledon, 400 miles under full sail down the motorway on the back of a trailer!
boat.name: Ferryman III
boat.short_description: Ferryman III is a 'one off' topsail schooner built in 1950.
